QuestData.Title: Rescuing Evanor
QuestData.Description: At last, we attack!$b$bOnce we've cleared the platform I'll use the key.$b$bYou are to ensure that Lady Evanor remains safe after her release.$b$bHurry now, let us be off!
QuestData.LogDescription: Anzim on Amber Ledge wants you to fly with his war mages to free Lady Evanor at Beryl Point. You are then to report to her in the mage tower on Amber Ledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lady Evanor at Amber Ledge in Borean Tundra.
QuestData.RewardText: Your heroic efforts shall not be forgotten, $c.$b$bPlease, accept this with my sincere gratitude.
